title: JavaScript Quiz
text: Test your knowledge on JavaScript ES6!
quizQuestions: Inside which HTML element do we put the JavaScript?

What is the correct JavaScript syntax to change the content of the following HTML element?:

This is a demonstration.
Where is the correct place to insert a JavaScript?
What is the correct syntax for referring to an external script called 'xxx.js'?
How do you write 'Hello World' in an alert box?
Choices: Both the <head> section and the <body> section are correct

title: Fruit Quiz
quizQuestions: How many seeds does the average watermellon have?
How many distinct species of strawberries are there?
An Apple Pear is a real fruit
How did the fruit 'Kiwi' get its name?
Choices: Named after a type of rock called a 'kiwi' that was known for growing a rare type of brown moss
Named after the Kiwi bird, as it was the same color
Named after a shooting star that was called the 'Kiwi Star' for its brown tinge.
Answers: Named after the Kiwi bird, as it was the same color

title: Star Wars Quiz

quizQuestions: Who was the pilot for the Millenium Falcon in the original movies?

Which Jedi has a purple light saber?
What is the technical name for force energy that reside in a Jedi
